about_the_game:
When your party beats a BOSSFIGHT, it becomes the next BOSSFIGHT!
  • Challenge yourself (literally!) as you try to one-up your previous party each time though this sidescrolling turn-based roguelike.
  • Outsmart enemy intents in a series of tactical combat encounters while assembling synergistic item builds.
  • Discover the nuances in this highly replayable game, lovingly designed to minimize complexity and maximize depth.


Items, items, items!
  • In Bossfight Tactics, it's all about the items; there are no character classes/abilities/stats/etc!
  • Items let you move, attack, gain passive abilities and much more.
  • With 100+ unique and quirky items, there are tons of emergent interactions to explore.


Instead of fixed movesets, enemies are equipped with random items which drop as loot when defeated.
  • Encounters are therefore always unique, often surprising, and sometimes hilarious!
  • Beware though, enemies grow stronger too as you unlock more powerful items.
  • Inspired by Into the Breach and Slay the Spire, enemies make their intents known, allowing you to plan and outmaneuver them.


  • Adapt on the fly by tossing the perfect item to an ally in a critical moment!
  • Or maybe just lob a bomb toward your enemies?

Other Features
  • A simple and intuitive interface that welcomes players new to the genre!
  • Unlimited undos for carefree experimentation and those misclick moments
  • An optional Auto-Battle button in case your brain has melted from all that strategizing. Also useful for discovering interesting moves. (Kinda like ChatGPT for turn-based tactics.)
  • No story or cut-scenes; every moment an interesting decision!
